plot: A young man in conflict with his past reflects on the acts he has done, and trying not to repeat his mistakes, he must face himself.
title: Cuando te veo
plot_es: A young man in conflict with his past reflects on the acts he has done, and trying not to repeat his mistakes, he must face himself.
plot_en: A young man in conflict with his past reflects on the acts he has done, and trying not to repeat his mistakes, he must face himself.
